casebody.data:
Harry D. MYERSON v. BLUE DIAMOND CORPORATION. No. 5607. Circuit Court o£ Appeals, Seventh Circuit. Jan. 21, 1936. Daniel M. Healy, of Chicago, Ill., for appellant. George O. Bunge, of Chicago, Ill., for appellee.

Before EVANS, Circuit Judge, and BRIGGLE and WOODWARD, District Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It is now here ordered, adjudged, and decreed by this court that the order or decree of the District Court of the United States, for the Northern District of Illinois, Eastern Division, in this cause appealed from be, and the same is hereby, affirmed with costs.
